videos.title: Debounce Function in JavaScript - JavaScript Job Interview question
videos.description: In this video, I have explained about the debounce function in JavaScript. This is a common question interviewers ask at Job Interviews. If you watch this video carefully, you will understand what is debounce and how to handle it with custom debounce function.

videos.title: #2 JavaScript Tips and Tricks - JavaScript Job Interview Questions
videos.description:
JavaScript Tips and Tricks - JavaScript Job Interview Questions - Bangla Tutorial 
In this video, I have shown 8 more JavaScript pro tips that will make a JavaScript Developer's life easier.

videos.title: Github Copilot Review Bangla - will it replace programmers?
videos.description:
According to GitHub, their Copilot application is an artificial intelligence pair programmer that "helps you write code faster and with less work". GitHub Copilot is a Visual Studio Code extension that generates code based on either a docstring, comment or function name.
In simpler words, you can write comments to describe the functionality you want, and the extension generates the appropriate code for you. In this video I have tried to explain whether it will replace programmer jobs or not. Hope this video will clear all your confusions and thereby help you.

Please note that this video is highly inspired the video on the same topic made by my favorite youtube channel - Fireship.io. Here is the video link -   

 ‚Ä¢ The Truth about G...

videos.title: Utility-First Approach | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description:
This is the 3rd video of "Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course". In this video, I have described the fundamental concept of Tailwind CSS - the Utility-First Design Approach - which is where Tailwind is different from other CSS frameworks like Bootstrap or Material UI.

videos.title: Responsive variants - Tailwind Breakpoints | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutoria
videos.description:
This is the 4th video of "Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course". In this video, you will get a clear concept about how responsiveness is handled in Tailwind. Tailwind gives us several device breakpoints which we can target to achieve responsiveness easily and efficiently.

üëç Full playlist link - https://lwsbd.link/tp
üëç GitHub Repository link - https://github.com/learnwithsumit/tai... [ branch 'lesson-4' ]

videos.description:

videos.title: Composing Utilities with @apply Directive | Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial
videos.description:
This is the 7th video of "Learn with Sumit Tailwind CSS Bangla Tutorial Course". In this video, you will understand how we can solve maintainability concerns of Tailwind CSS by composing functional utilities with @apply directive and group them together in a single class for reuse.
